         Quick Links     To assist in finding essential student services and information such as university calendars, transcripts, registering for classes, preparing for graduation, and other relative services to a students records, please click on the topical links below:          Student Records     Transcripts   Change of Name     Degree Audit   Enrollment Verification & Other Certifications   Grades     Graduation            Registration     Albert Log-In     Albert Student Guide   Albert Course Search   Fall 2015 Registration   Term Withdrawal            Other Topics       De-enrollment Process   Calendars   TAP (Tuition Assistance Program)   Veteran Benefits / VA Certification   FERPA               Much of the information listed above is overseen by the Office of the Registrar which is responsible for the integrity of academic policies, the student information system and student records from application to degree conferral. For further assistance, call or visit as follows:            Student Services Centers ( click for hours )    25 West Fourth Street  New York, NY 10012-1199     5 MetroTech Center   Dibner Building, Room 201   Brooklyn, New York 11201       ° Phone Numbers     ° Online Contact Form                                 Dates and Deadlines   APR  2015  3 Last day to use the Term Withdrawal Form to submit a spring semester term withdrawal request.  20 Registration Begins by appointment for Undergraduate, Graduate and Diploma students.  MAY  2015  8 - 19 Spring Semeseter Exams -   Polytechnic School of Engineering  11 Last day of Spring 2015 classes  12 Reading Day  13 - 19 Spring Semester Exams  20 Commencement  25 Memorial Day  No classes scheduled / University Holiday  25 Last day of active waitlists for classes scheduled during the 12-week session, the 7-week session, the first 6-week session, the first 3-week session, and the special session.  25 Last day to enroll on Albert for those classes scheduled during the 12-week session, the 7-week session, the first 6-week session, the first 3-week session, and the special session. Registration transactions for these sessions, after this date, must be done at the Student Services Center.  Albert registration continues for classes in other Summer Sessions.                                         We're making it easier to find important dates, deadlines, resources, and services. NYU >  University Registrar > Academic Records > Official Transcripts                                                                             Skip to Navigation | Skip to Content                                            Home | Student Services Centers | About Us | Contact Us                                    Quick Links         Academic Calendars      Administrative Units         Apply for Jobs        Athletics           Bookstores       Bursar      Campus Map      Career Development      Emergencies        Event Calendar      Giving to NYU           Housing      ITS      Libraries      News        NYU Apparel      Policies      Public Safety      Registrar      Student Health Center      Student Resources        Wellness Exchange               Schools         Arts and Science      College of Arts and Science      College of Dentistry        College of Nursing      Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences          Gallatin School of Individualized Study      Graduate School of Arts and Science      Institute of Fine Arts      Institute for the Study of the Ancient World            Leonard N. Stern School of Business        Liberal Studies Program      NYU Abu Dhabi      NYU Shanghai      Polytechnic School of Engineering      Robert F. Wagner Graduate School of Public Service          School of Continuing and Professional Studies      School of Law        School of Medicine      Silver School of Social Work      Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development      Tisch School of the Arts                                             Search      go                                                New York University              New York University              University Registrar                                                     Calendars                             Course Search                             Registration                              Academic Records                                       Request Official Transcript                Request Unofficial Transcript                Enrollment Verification                Check My Grades                Grading Information                   Transcript Information                   Manage Guest Users on Albert                                                                       Graduation                             Veterans Benefits                             University Policies & FERPA                          Forms & Procedures                          Training Guides                         Home          |         Academic Records             |          Official Transcripts                                    Official Transcripts                 An official transcript is a comprehensive record of a student's academic progress at New York University. The NYU Registrar issues official transcripts in two formats:      Signed & sealed paper transcript (no fee)    Secure PDF electronic transcript ($3.25 processing fee)       Important Transcript Information      Transcripts contain confidential academic information and are released in accordance with the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act of 1974 (FERPA), and therefore will not be issued without authorization from the student/alumnus .    Students/alumni at NYU Graduate Stern School of Business or NYU School of Medicine must contact their school records office.    E-Transcripts are not available for students who attended NYU prior to 1990.       How to Request an Official Transcript      Instructions for students who attended after 2001 and have a valid NetID    Instructions for students who are unable to access Albert, do not have a NetID or who attended prior to 1990       Questions? Contact Us      Fax: (212) 995-4154    Mail: Office of the Registrar        Academic Records        P.O. Box 910        New York, NY 10276-0910      Email: academic.records@nyu.edu (please make sure to include your signed form or     letter as an attachment)              Current and Former Students Attending After 2001:     If you attended NYU after 2001 and are able to access NYUHome/Albert, you can request an official paper or electronic transcript from the Albert Student Center. The Request official transcript link can be found under the My Academics section of Albert Student Center.    Transcripts cannot be produced for anyone whose record has been put on hold for an outstanding University obligation.    Tip: Before you complete your request, check to ensure that all your grades have been posted. If you are a recent graduate, also check to ensure that your degree has been posted. You can view all posted grades and ensure that your degree has been recorded by viewing your unofficial transcript .     SPECIAL HANDLING: If your request requires special handling, you must request a paper transcript using the Secure Online Transcript Request Form . Specify your special handling instructions in the comments field at the bottom of the form. Special handling includes:      Sending paper transcripts to yourself in separate sealed envelopes addressed to admissions offices of other universities.    Sending paper transcripts with additional documents to be sent along with the NYU transcript. Additional documents can be sent to our office via fax, mail, or email. Please include your transcript request number on all correspondence.    FedEx: the express mail service provider used by the Registrar's Office is FedEx. Please note that requesting documents to be sent via FedEx does not guarantee the processing time. All requests are processed in the order in which the requests are received.    A. Complete a FexEx Shipping Label . The address in the "From" section should be as follows: Your Name, NYU, 105 E.17th Street, NY, NY 10003 (the address where the package is originating from).     B. Send the request form and the label as attachments to academic.records@nyu.edu .             Undergraduate students please note:   Your academic advisor is a critical resource for making important academic decisions. Be sure to consult with your advisor if you are considering attending a summer session or study abroad program at another university or if you are considering transferring out of NYU to complete your degree elsewhere.                 Former students unable to access Albert, don't have a NetID, or who attended prior to 1990:    Paper transcript requests: Complete the Online Transcript Request Form and mail, fax, or email the signature page to our office. A signed consent form is required.    Electronic transcript requests: order directly from NSC .    SPECIAL HANDLING: If your request requires special handling, you must request a paper transcript using the Secure Online Transcript Request Form . Specify your special handling instructions in the comments field at the bottom of the form. Special handling includes:      Sending paper transcripts to yourself in separate sealed envelopes addressed to admissions offices of other universities.    Sending paper transcripts with additional documents to be sent along with the NYU transcript. Additional documents can be sent to our office via fax, mail, or email. Please include your transcript request number on all correspondence.    FedEx: the express mail service provider used by the Registrar's Office is FedEx. Please note that requesting documents to be sent via FedEx does not guarantee the processing time. All requests are processed in the order in which the requests are received.    A. Complete a FexEx Shipping Label . The address in the "From" section should be as follows: Your Name, NYU, 105 E.17th Street, NY, NY 10003 (the address where the package is originating from).     B. Send the request form and the label as attachments to academic.records@nyu.edu .         There is no limit for the number of official transcripts that can be issued to a student. Indicate in your request if you would like us to forward the transcripts to your home address, but we still require the name and address of each institution you are requesting transcripts for.    If you initiate your transcript request through the online transcript request form , you will receive email confirmation from our office when we receive your signed request form. If you have any questions or concerns please contact our office at (212)998-4280 and a representative will assist you.                                   Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. All rights reserved.
